Uses of Package
com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker

  • Packages that use com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker
    Provides a failure detection and fallback mechanism based of circuit breaker pattern.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker.metrics
    Metrics monitoring for CircuitBreaker.
  • Classes in com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker used by com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker 
    Class and Description
    CircuitBreaker
    A circuit breaker, which tracks the number of succcess/failure requests and detects a remote service failure.
    CircuitBreakerBuilder
    Builds a CircuitBreaker instance using builder pattern.
    CircuitBreakerClient
    A Client decorator that handles failures of remote invocation based on circuit breaker pattern.
    CircuitBreakerListener
    The listener interface for receiving CircuitBreaker events.
    CircuitBreakerMapping
    Returns a CircuitBreaker instance from remote invocation parameters.
    CircuitState
    Defines the states of circuit breaker.
    EventCount
    An immutable object that stores the count of events.
    ExceptionFilter
    A filter that decides whether circuit breaker should deal with a given error raised by remote service.
    KeyedCircuitBreakerMapping.KeySelector
    Returns the mapping key of the given remote invocation parameters.
  • Classes in com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker used by com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker.metrics 
    Class and Description
    CircuitBreaker
    A circuit breaker, which tracks the number of succcess/failure requests and detects a remote service failure.
    CircuitBreakerListener
    The listener interface for receiving CircuitBreaker events.
    CircuitState
    Defines the states of circuit breaker.
    EventCount
    An immutable object that stores the count of events.
